allow: Bash(do sed -i '' 's/let a `useOrders` hook own the network call while an `OrdersTable` component simply renders rows/let a data fetching layer own the network call while a table component simply renders rows/g' "$file")

Bash(do sed -i '' 's/keep a `UserCard` component focused on presentation while a `useUserCard` hook fetches and normalizes its data/keep a `UserCard` component focused on presentation while a data fetching layer fetches and normalizes its data/g' "$file")
Bash(do sed -i '' 's/API clients, hooks, and UI elements/API clients, data fetching logic, and UI elements/g' "$file")
